about_the_game:
4 video backgrounds from previous versions of iVIBRATE Ultimate Edition to give your app a new look!

These backgrounds are completely free and show the progression of the look of iVIBRATE over the last 2 years!

content_descriptors.notes: The base iVIBRATE Ultimate Edition is intended for an adult purpose and audience.

detailed_description:
4 video backgrounds from previous versions of iVIBRATE Ultimate Edition to give your app a new look!

These backgrounds are completely free and show the progression of the look of iVIBRATE over the last 2 years!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

name: iVIBRATE Ultimate Edition - Video Backgrounds

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
